posts.post_content:
***SOLD***
Solid group of (7) VG T206 Polar Bears for sale. All Guaranteed to grade numerically. [STRIKE]$285[/STRIKE] New price, $259 delivered for the group. 
That breaks down to $37 bucks a card. Sorry, but I won't split the group up. Paypal is A-Okay with no extra fee. 
Please drop me a PM or email if interested. Thank you, Tony

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

Heinie Wagner
Fred Beck
